EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_The New Digital Economy for Ireland_Q415.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You are Confirmed!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Wednesday, October 21, 2015 The CHQ Building IFSC Custom House Quay Dublin {{my.Save the Date:default=Edit me}} Thank you for registering for the upcoming The New Digital Economy Event.
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://pivotal.io/event/the-new-digital-economy>. AGENDA
8:45 AM - 9:15 AM Registration
9:15 AM - 9:20 AM Welcome
9:20 AM - 10:00 AM Digital Disruption: The Outlook
10:00 AM - 11:00 AM Why Ireland is at the Heart of the New Digital Economy
11:00 AM - 11:15 AM Break
11:15 AM - 11:45 PM Why Are Digital Disruptors Successful and How Can You Become One?
11:45 PM - 12:15 PM How to Acquire (and Retain) More Customers Through Superior Digital Experience
12:15 PM - 12:30 PM Transformation: Make it Happen
12:00 PM Lunch and Networking VIEW FULL AGENDA <http://pivotal.io/event/the-new-digital-economy>
